(Simplified: 谯)
Pictophonetic: 焦 indicates the sound; 言 (speech) conveys the meaning.
  • Chinese Definition:
  • Chinese Definition:
  • ⿰ Left to right
    • 言 [ yán ] words, speech; to speak, to say
    • 焦 [ jiāo ] burned, scorched; anxious, vexed
①(譙樓)古代城門上建的樓，可以瞭望。
②(譙譙)毛羽殘敝。
譙城區 [ qiáo chéng qū ]: Qiaocheng district of Bozhou city 亳州市 , Anhui
譙城 [ qiáo chéng ]: Qiaocheng district of Bozhou city 亳州市 , Anhui
①責備；譴責。［例］誚讓項羽。——《史記·樊噲傳》。索隱：“責也。”［例］不譙呵。——《史記·萬石張叔傳》。［例］另足蕩遊不作，老者譙之。——《管子·揆度》。［合］譙呵(大罵；申斥)；譙勵(督責勉勵)；譙怒(怒斥)；譙諭(責問並使曉諭)。
②另見qiáo。

譙字的基本解释

譙
qiáo

譙字的汉语字典释义

[①]［qiáo］
［《廣韻》昨焦切，平宵，從。］
“谯1”的繁体字。
(1)城门上的瞭望楼。
(2)通“燋1”。枯焦。引申为酷烈。
(3)通“燋2”。憔悴。参见“譙譙”。
(4)姓。汉代有谯玄。见《後汉书》本传。
(5)古县名。在今安徽省亳州市。参见“譙居”。
[②]［qiào］
［《集韻》才笑切，去笑，從。］
“谯2”的繁体字。
责备；谴责。

譙字的康熙字典解释

【酉集上】【言字部】　譙； 康熙笔画：19； 页码：页1182第02
〔古文〕誚【唐韻】才肖切【集韻】【韻會】才笑切【正韻】在笑切，?樵去聲。【說文】嬈譊也。【廣雅】呵也。【廣韻】責也。【增韻】以辭相責也。【揚子·方言】讓也，齊楚宋衞荆?之閒曰譙。自關而西秦晉之閒，凡言相責讓曰譙讓。【史記·萬石君傳】子孫有過失，不譙讓爲便坐對案不食。【前漢·高帝紀】樊噲亦譙讓羽。【師古註】譙讓，以辭相責也。【史記·樊噲傳】作誚讓。譙誚二字古通。互詳誚字註。　又山水名。【山海經】譙明之山，譙水出焉，西流注于河。　又【廣韻】昨焦切【集韻】【韻會】慈焦切【正韻】慈消切，?音樵。樓之別稱也。【史記·?涉世家】守丞與戰譙門中。【師古註】譙門，謂門上爲高樓，以望遠者耳。樓一名譙，故謂美麗之樓爲麗譙。譙，亦呼爲巢。所謂巢車者，亦於兵車之上爲樓以望敵也。譙、巢聲相近，本一物也。【莊子·徐無鬼】盛鶴列于麗譙之閒。　又國名。【左傳·隱二年杜註】譙國龍亢縣東南有向城。　又縣名。沛郡有譙縣。見【前漢·地理志】。　又姓。譙周。見【後漢·五行志】。　又通作

Qiao
Basic explanation of words
Qiao
qiáo
Qiao
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［qiáo］
["Guang Yun" Jiao cut yesterday, flat night, from. ]
Traditional characters for "谯1".
(1) The watchtower on the city gate.
(2) Through "燋1". Withered. The extension is cool.
(3) Through "燋2". Haggard. See "Qiao Qiao".
(4) Last name. There was Qiao Xuan in the Han Dynasty. See the biography of "Hou Han Shu".
(5) The name of the ancient county. In today's Bozhou City, Anhui Province. See "Qiaoju".
[②]［qiào］
["Ji Yun" only laughed and cut, laughed, and followed. ]
Traditional characters for "谯2".
Blame; condemn.
Qiao
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[You Ji 1] [Words Department] 　谯; Kangxi strokes: 19; Page number: page 1182 02
[Ancient text] [Tang Yun] Only Xiao cut [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] Only laughed and cut [Zheng Yun] was laughing and cutting, Qiao Qiao went. [Said the text] Lao Xiao also. [Guang Ya] Oh, too. [Guang Yun] Responsibility. [Zeng Yun] Responsibility with words. 【Yangtze Dialect】Rang Ye, Qi Chu Song Weijing? Zhixian said Qiao. From the customs to the leisure of the Western Qin and Jin Dynasties, all words and responsibilities should be called slanderous. [Historical Records·Wan Shijun Biography] The descendants are at fault, so they can sit on the case and not eat. [Previous Han · Gao Di Ji] Fan Kuai also Qiao Rang Yu. [Shigu's Note] Qiao and renunciation are also used to blame each other. [Historical Records·Fan Kui Biography] Make a confession. The word Qiao Xiao is ancient. Mutual detailed ridiculous notes.　The name of the landscape. [Shanhaijing] Qiaoming's mountain, Qiaoshui flows out of Yan, and flows westward into the river.　[Guang Yun] Yesterday Jiao Qi [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] Ci Jiao Qi [Zheng Yun] Ci Xiao Qi,? Yin Qiao. Another name for the building. [Historical Records? She Family] Shou Cheng and Zhan Qiao Men. [Shigu Note] Qiaomen means that there are tall buildings on the door, and those who look far away can hear it. There is a Qiao in the building, so the beautiful building is Li Qiao. Qiao, also called the nest. The so-called lorry nestlers also stand on top of the chariot to look at the enemy. Qiao and nest sounds similar, they are the same thing. [Zhuangzi·Xu Wugui] Sheng He is listed in Li Qiao’s leisure.　 Also the name of the country. [Zuo Zhuan·Yin 2nd Year Du Note] Youxiang City, southeast of Longkang County, Qiaoguo.　Also the county name. Pei County has Qiao County. See [Former Han Geography].　Another last name. Qiao Zhou. See【Hou Han·Five Elements】.　Yutongsaku
